summary: Defines the FastAPI and Socket.IO based backend for the Chainlit application, exposing HTTP endpoints for authentication, user session handling, thread and feedback CRUD operations, static asset delivery, OAuth callbacks, and integrations with external messaging platforms, while managing configuration and runtime lifecycle.
business_intent: To power the Chainlit web interface by providing a secure, configurable server that handles user authentication, conversation thread storage, feedback collection, file serving, and external service integrations, enabling developers to deploy interactive AI chat experiences.
